rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We understand that you would like the national minimum wage to be increased for certain types of work, but we're not sure which roles and what level you would like it to be set at.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what amount you would like the minimum wage to be increased to and to which types of job it should be applied..
